programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A terrorist who specializes in explosives takes hold of an underground tunnel and threatens to kill hostages if his demands are not met

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Visionary designer Sue Wong and Tulane University professor Shieh Hsieh share their experiences blending Chinese heritage with American innovation. Their captivating stories transcend cultural boundaries, harmoniously weaving tradition and modernity into inspiring narratives of creativity and transformative collaboration.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: After an assassination attempt is made on Shen Yu Fei, Ye Wen Jie encourages her to leave for safety. Ye Wen Jie brings Wang Miao to visit the long-abandoned Hong'an Base.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie continures her story and reveals the true purpose of the base was to search for extraterrestrial civilizations. After bidding goodbye to Wang Miao, Ye Wen Jie stays and watches the sunset, as if waiting for something.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Dong Yu looks for Mandy's father, Ming Fa, and catches a reporter passing him money donated by the readers. Dong Yu follows Ming Fa to the gambling den and threatens Ming Fa with a video of him there. Ming Fa then clarifies online that his daughter is not unfilial and Mandy is grateful towards Dong Yu.

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: A terrorist who specializes in explosives takes hold of an underground tunnel and threatens to kill hostages if his demands are not met

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: Get an inside look into the 9th China-US Cultural and Entertainment Summit, listen to the story of Xu Zheng filming "Dying to Survive", and hit an awards dinner with Hollywood celebrities.

programme.title: Explore China Shorts
programme.desc: Follow Hal into the giant panda base and get ready to say "aw".

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A terrorist who specializes in explosives, whose gang has been dismantled, seeks revenge and the cop that stopped him once before must do so again.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Despite living with Spinal Muscular Atrophy, Ben Lou transcends physical limitations through his extraordinary brilliance in mathematics and physics. He shares his inspiring journey, showcasing how resilience and intellect have turned adversity into a catalyst for groundbreaking innovation.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Wang Xuan visits an injured Zi Dan much to the dissatisfaction of Xiao Qi.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Before he passes away, the Emperor shares the location of the edict with Wang Xuan and instructs her to announce it after his death.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: Yan Sum is promoted to Acting General Manager, and Chiu-dai is assigned to PR Department so as to unite the Mas in group business development.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: Kai-lai curries favor with Lok-yee.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wang Miao meets Shi Qiang to exchange the information they have obtained, and Shi Qiang does not believe that everything was coincidence. The two set off back to Beijing, and ask Xu Bing Bing to continue investigating Shen Yufei's whereabouts.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wei Cheng tells the story of how his obsession with trying to solve the Three-Body calculation led him to marry Shen Yu Fei and how he received threats on his life from Pan Han should he try to discontinue solvng the problem.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Si Jin's mother, Bao Ling, returns from overseas and advises Jin Quan to stop objecting to Kai Wei and Si Jin from being together, revealing his selfish motives for doing so. Jin Quan is worried that Si Jin, who has no blood relations with him, would throw him aside. Si Jin is shocked to overhear Jin Quan's conversation with Bao Ling.
